spec_data.Name: sshrc
spec_data.Description:
You can use this to set environment variables, define functions,
and run post-login commands. This is quite useful when you have several
servers that you don't want to configure independently.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 06:46:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bring your bash and vim configuration in your ssh session
